name: Ai2 SERA (Open Coding Agents)
description: Allen Institute for AI (Ai2) released open-source coding agents family starting with SERA (Soft-Verified Efficient Repository Agents), achieving 49.5% on SWE-bench Verified. Low-cost adaptation ($400-$12K) for customizing to private codebases with complete training recipes.
community_quotes: 'Open-source coding agents just got accessible' - Devops.com
'Could change how software gets written' - The AI Economy

name: Moonshot Kimi K2.5 + Coding Agent
description: Chinese AI company Moonshot released Kimi K2.5 open-source model with a specialized coding agent. Features multimodal capabilities including vision understanding, agent swarm technology for orchestrating multiple parallel AI agents, and can watch videos to write code. Released under Apache 2.0 License.
community_quotes: 'Most powerful open source LLM, beating Opus 4.5' - VentureBeat
'Agent swarm capabilities for collaborative problem-solving' - Pandaily

name: Kilo Code Reviewer
description: AI-powered code review tool that automatically analyzes Pull Requests the moment they're opened. Achieved #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt with 610 upvotes on January 27, 2026. Open-source, model-agnostic AI coding assistant.
community_quotes: 'Automated code review the moment you open a PR' - Product Hunt description

name: APX Terminal
description: Encrypted terminal and SSH client with built-in AI assistant. Launched on Product Hunt January 26, 2026, achieving 103 upvotes. Designed to help developers and system administrators with command lookups and terminal-related tasks without needing to search Google.
community_quotes: 'Encrypted terminal with AI assistant - stop Googling commands' - Product Hunt tagline

name: GitHub Copilot SDK
description: GitHub's SDK that allows developers to build AI agents into any application. Launched in technical preview on January 22, 2026, enabling integration of Copilot agents into custom apps with Microsoft Agent Framework support.

name: Blink Agent Builder
description: A 'vibe coding' platform that lets users build agentic AI applications using natural language. Ranked #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt with 293 upvotes, enabling anyone to spin up powerful AI agents without code.

name: OpenCode GitHub Copilot Integration
description: GitHub officially integrated OpenCode with GitHub Copilot on January 16, 2026, allowing users to connect GitHub Copilot within OpenCode via the /connect command.
community_quotes: 'Largest growth yet in the coding agent wars' - Medium (Jan 12, 2026)

name: JetBrains ACP Agent Registry
description: Official registry for AI coding agents using Agent Communication Protocol, integrating directly into JetBrains IDEs to help developers discover and connect AI agents.
